alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 15 at 2:18PM MDT until October 18 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Petroleum, Garfield, Northern Phillips and Southwest Phillips Counties. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Garfield; Northern Phillips; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips
